languages.text: {n}Повисает тягостная пауза, Соломон не мигая смотрит на вас, и, наконец, склоняет голову.{/n} "Я понял вас, Вольный Торговец".
{n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Повисает тягостная пауза, Соломон не мигая смотрит на вас, и, наконец, склоняет голову.{/n} "Я понял вас, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you without blinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."
{n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you without blinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."
{n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."
{n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."
{n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."
{n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}Se produce una pausa tensa. Solomorne te observa sin pestañear hasta que finalmente inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Entendido, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce una pausa tensa. Solomorne te observa sin pestañear hasta que finalmente inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Entendido, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}沉重的缄默笼罩在你们身上。索罗蒙看着你，眼睛一眨不眨。到最后，他低下了头。{/n}“了解，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}沉重的缄默笼罩在你们身上。索罗蒙看着你，眼睛一眨不眨。到最后，他低下了头。{/n}“了解，行商浪人。”

languages.text: {n}重々しい沈黙があり、ソロモーンはまばたきせずにあなたを見てからついに頭を垂れる。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、わかりました」
languages.original_text: {n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}重々しい沈黙があり、ソロモーンはまばたきせずにあなたを見てからついに頭を垂れる。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、わかりました」

languages.text: {n}Es entsteht eine lange Pause. Solmorne sieht dich ungerührt an, senkt aber schließlich den Kopf.{/n} "Verstanden, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es entsteht eine lange Pause. Solmorne sieht dich ungerührt an, senkt aber schließlich den Kopf.{/n} "Verstanden, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: {n}S'ensuit un silence à couper au couteau. Solomorne vous observe sans ciller avant d'incliner la tête d'un air résigné.{/n} « Compris, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}S'ensuit un silence à couper au couteau. Solomorne vous observe sans ciller avant d'incliner la tête d'un air résigné.{/n} « Compris, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}Ağır bir duraklama yaşanıyor. Solomorne, gözlerini kırpmadan seni izleyip ardından nihayet başını eğiyor.{/n} "Anlaşıldı Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a heavy pause. Solomorne watches you, unblinking, then finally bows his head.{/n} "Understood, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ağır bir duraklama yaşanıyor. Solomorne, gözlerini kırpmadan seni izleyip ardından nihayet başını eğiyor.{/n} "Anlaşıldı Hür Tacir."
